content: KRUVE EQ glassware is scientifically designed to amplify or soften certain flavor notes – just like an audio equalizer and put you in control of your sensory experience!

Keep your favorite fruits and veggies from going bad before you get to eat them with help from this vacuum sealing container system. At the touch of a button the base vacuum seals your container so that the contents inside last up to 5 times longer!

Step into the future of charging with Archon, the invisible long distance wireless charger. Capable of charging your devices through desks, tabletops and even thick cases – it’s perfect for clearing off the cable clutter and charging with style.

Keep your home smelling fresh while ensuring your kitty is in perfect health with the automatic and health tracking litter box. This smart litter box analyzes your cat’s waste and streams all the data to your smartphone so that you can easily review it.

The effortlessly stylish blackest watch delivers the most fascinating and best time reading experience in the history of watchmaking. It features an ultra black watch face so dark that it absorbs 99.9% of light for ultra low reflectance.

Finally make progress on that screen play you’ve been tinkering with for the better part of your adult life by sitting down in front of Traveler – the ultimate distraction-free writing device. It eliminates all distractions so you can focus your thoughts and get down to business.

The Omni Ultimate power bank will provide a charging experience like no other! It comes equipped with everything from USB-A and USB-C ports to an AC outlet and a DC out port, and boasts a removable 40,300 mAh battery that recharges in as little as 2.5 hours.

titleEN: The World’s 1st Android TV Pocket Cinema
content: Capsule II is the world’s first Android powered TV pocket cinema! This compact gadget fits discreetly almost anywhere and is packed with a 100% brighter screen, 3,600+ Android TV apps, and 3 hours of playtime with a 720p HD picture and 1-second autofocus.

Explore the microscopic world that lies hidden in plain sight by augmenting your smartphone with this fingertip microscope. Compatible with both Androids and iPhones, the device goes over your smartphone’s camera to add up to an 800x zoom.

Improve the taste and quality of your H2O with the Mayu water purification device. The swirling motion aerates the water with atmospheric oxygen, which triggers a subtle chemical chain reaction that cleanses it of potentially harmful compounds.

If there’s a certain skill that you want to improve on over time, the Every Day calendar will help you stay motivated and reach your goals. After you complete your task for the day, simply press a button to light it up and easily track your progress and dedication over time.

titleEN: Four Color Car LED Headlight Bulbs
content: The Boslla Bullet is the world’s first four-color car LED headlight bulb which works perfectly in sunny, snowy, rainy, foggy weather and even emergency situations. It provides not only safe but also fun night driving experience.

Learn about the science and technology that goes into making smartphones by building your very own using the MAKERphone DIY mobile phone kit. With this fun and educational kit you’ll be able to assemble and code your very own programmable smartphone!
Constructed from NanoTech TGlass, PURP was designed to protect our screens from damage all while shielding our eyes from the harmful blue light emitted from our devices.

titleEN: Solo Stove Low Smoke Fire Pit
content: The Solo Stove low smoke fire pit lets you enjoy a nice roaring flame without the usual mountain of smoke that accompanies it. The design allows cool air to feed the fire at the base while the double walled design prevents billowing clouds of smoke from forming.

Bring a small piece of the Mesozoic era into your modern home with this Jurassic block dinosaur fossil collection. Each transparent block displays 25 small fossils from some of the most recognized dinos of the Jurassic and Cretaceous periods.

Stop wasting money on fancy furniture for your feline – science has proven with utmost certainty that cats love corrugated cardboard boxes above everything else – even you. They’re decorated with a lovely geometric design that will add style to your room.

Add the final element of immersion to your virtual reality experience by exploring the virtual world with these virtual reality shoes. These high-tech accessories will allow you to easily walk and run without actually having to move around the room.

Get around quicker and more effortlessly than you ever thought possible by hopping on the UrmO foldable urban vehicle. This self-balancing scooter features a 20 mile range and conveniently folds down so that you can carry it around like a briefcase.

Let your creativity shine through by putting it on display with Pix – the digital display backpack. It features an elegant and stylish all black design complemented with a built-in screen that lets you showcase a series of images, widgets, or your own custom artwork.

Locky is the revolutionary new device that will make your house key smart rather ran the lock on your door. It can track your key usage and allow you to monitor your door’s status anytime and anywhere through the app on your smartphone.

Ditch those ugly and bulky helmets and ride round in style by upgrading to the foldable bike helmet from Park & Diamond. It features a form-fitting design that’s styled to look like a regular baseball cap and can fold down flat so that you can easily carry it around inside your bag.
6 seconds. That’s all you need. Brush all of your teeth simultaneously with UNOBrush™! The unique uniform forms to fit your teeth, creating a truly personal brushing experience.

Transform your phone into a fun and affordable DSLR camera using the Pictar Pro smartphone adapter. Compatible with both Androids and iPhones, this adapter will let you maximize your phone’s existing camera to take incredible DSLR camera quality pictures.

Ensure nothing you do or say is being recorded without your consent or knowledge by scanning every room you enter with this hidden camera detector tool. It features 6 LED strobe lights that will bounce off and detect any camera lenses that may be hidden around the room.

SPRY is the waterproof drone that will conquer both land and sea! This versatile little drone is capable of capturing 4K/30fps videos and 12MP photos all while having the ability to travel underwater or fly through the air at speeds of up to 43 miles per hour.

With these Cross Grips multi-use fitness handles there’s no excuse for not working out on a regular basis. They allow you to turn almost any doorway in your home or office into a minimalist yet versatile gym that will work out your entire body.

Stay connected even when you venture off into the great outdoors by taking the PowerTalkie off-grid walkie talkie with you. It allows your smartphone to remain connected to the digital world even when there is absolutely no mobile service available in your area.

Give your home an other-worldly ambiance when the lights go off by switching on the Hypercube. In this hi-tech work of art, small LEDs sit within a cavity of semitransparent mirrored acrylics that combine to produce absolutely stunning visual effects!

titleEN: Zip Top Reusable Stand Up Containers
content: Move over Tupperware – these Zip Top reusable stand up containers are the new top dog! They feature a rigid platinum silicone body that makes them endlessly reusable along with a zip lock back top that completely eliminates the need for lids.

Set up your tripod in 4 seconds flat with Lumapod – the world’s fastest tripod! This ultra-compact and lightning fast tripod solution weighs less than a single pound and can expand up to 33.5 inches tall – making it a must-have accessory any photographer!

Make your daily lunch routine a bit easier, colorful, and all around more pleasant experience with the world’s best smart lunchbox. It features a modular container system that allows you customize its layout depending on what’s on the menu for that day.

titleEN: One-Touch Coffee And Cold Brew Maker
content: FrankOne is the one-touch coffee and cold brewer that lets you enjoy a great cup of Joe virtually anywhere. This portable coffee maker utilizes vacuum technology to use negative pressure to force water through a bed of ground coffee for less bitterness and more flavor.

The Casper Board is the only platform that promotes weight loss, heart health, and a mental boost when you sit and stand during the workday. It is a balance board with full range ankle mobility and a foot rest with 360° rotation in one device!

The IRL Ad Blocker glasses are the ingenious screen blocking wearable accessory that will cut out noisy advertisements and other obnoxious digital screens that are constantly vying for your time and attention so that you can go back to enjoying the world around you.

Keep your food fresh at the campsite with the Fenik no ice cooler. Using no electricity or ice, the walls of this revolutionary cooler are lined with an evaporative smart material that cools down the contents inside while still retaining the liquid.

LIMBO is a smart, self-balancing electric gyro, disguised as a beautiful CNC machined top that spins for hours – even set a Guinness world record for longest spin time for a spinning mechanical top! LIMBO can also spin on surfaces that other tops can’t, like a tomato!

Take the hard work and mess out of making delicious craft beer by leaving it all up to the all-in-one craft beer brewing machine. This fully contained brewery handles both the fermentation and brewing process – leaving you more time to enjoy your refreshing brew.

This high performance headlamp from BioLite is just what you need to reliably light up dimly lit trails. It’s ultra lightweight, features a slim profile, along with a small front mounted 330 lumen head lamp with 4 handy lighting modes.

If your next project requires more complicated cuts than a standard straight line, then Perfect Cut is the all-in-one utility knife for the job. This multi-purpose knife is designed to perform impeccable cuts on all types of materials ranging from cardboard to cloth.

Instantly transform the back of your truck into the ultimate tailgating spot using this modular tailgate system. It hooks up over any pickup tailgate to provide you with two comfy lounger chairs in addition to a handy insulated cooler.

If you’re heading out into the great unknown, there’s no better pack to trust with your gear than the Alta 21 packable multi-use backpack. This 100% waterproof pack has a detachable hip pack system, inflatable back support, and folds down to a small pack for easy carry.

Move through the water more gracefully than ever by grabbing a hold of the Trident underwater scooter. It’s small enough to easily transport to any watering hole and comes with dual thrusters that allow you to move at speeds of up to 26 mph and dive down to 164 feet.

From the co-creators of Secret Hitler and Better Myths comes Inhuman Conditions, the five minute party game for two players that will have you rolling on the floor laughing. Through a series of questions, one player must determine if the other player is a robot or human.

Avoid injury and unessassary wear and tear of your body by packing all your gear inside the floating backpack. The ingenious design of this backpack is said to reduce impact forces of walking or running by up to 86%!

Hoverboards and bulky Segways are old news, these Drift W1 Skates from Segway are the hip and incredibly fun new way to get around. These ultra portable splashproof skates allow for precision steering ideal for crowded places and can travel at speeds up to 7.5 mph.

Enjoy a barbershop-like shave from the comfort of home by upgrading to the Gillette heated shaving razor. The razor is designed to heat up in less than a second in order to deliver the comfort of a hot towel with every stroke for an unmatched shaving experience.

Bring steakhouse quality to your home with this German engineered specialized infrared gas grill. It’s capable of reaching temperatures of 1500 degrees Fahrenheit in just minutes, and distributes heat evenly so you’re left with a steakhouse quality slab every time.

Standing is overrated! Ensure you’re never forced to go without a comfy seat by strapping on this exoskeleton wearable chair. This lightweight and ultra portable device conveniently straps around your hips so that you can sit down with perfect posture anywhere you go.

Ride from the mountains to the streets with this easy to use zip-tire system. The reTyre One system lets you easily slide on the tire that best matches your terrain, so you can go from gravel to snow-ready in just under 60 seconds!

Give yourself another reason to not get out of bed in the mornings by placing your workstation on the overhead rolling table. This ultra-useful accessory can instantly turn your bedroom into a cozy and comfy second living room or office.

Decrease the risk of possible accidents on nocturnal rides by outfitting your ride with these 360 degree bicycle wheel reflectors. These ultra bight reflectors will guarantee that you’ll be seen no matter what direction the traffic is coming from.

The World of Warcraft diary is the literary work no true fan of the iconic game can be without. In this must-read tell-all, the game’s first 3D level designer reveals the ugly and crazy world of making games with 336 full color pages and over 130 amazing captioned photos.

Errant is the ultimate everyday backpack that will conform and adapt to suit your particular lifestyle. It features a stripped down minimalist design with a tough weatherproof exterior while providing ample space for all your gear inside.

Achieve 365 days of security on a single charge with the VAVA wire-free security camera! This discreet weatherproof 1080p camera has all the features you’d want from a premium security system along with free cloud storage backup and IFTTT support.

Ensure you and your spouse sleep like babies – no matter what the ambient temperature is like – with the BedJet 3 bed climate control system. This WiFi connected system gives each person the option of raising or lowering the bed’s temperature on either side.

Add life to any dull room in your home by creating a mesmerizing light show with this liquid light modern lava lamp. This fusion between art and technology utilizes smoke and laser beams to create wonderfully abstract ever-changing works of art.

Infinite is the extremely versatile smart cooler that will keep the party going anywhere. This 61 quart capacity cooler can keep ice cold for up to 12 days and comes loaded with features ranging from powerful speakers to a built-in HD camera and a 550W blender.

Spin Mezmoglobe and it will turn into a hypnotic optical illusion of continuously flowing helix. Precisely engineered globe, odd fidgeting toy, a playable kinetic art piece – Mezmoglobe is all those things combined into one strangely addictive object!

With this handy multi-tool clip on you, not only will your hair be perfectly coiffed, but you’ll have a drawer’s worth on of useful tools at your disposal. This TSA-tested hair clip is equipped with everything from a mini-screwdriver and wire stripper to a serrated edge and wick holder.

Soundots is the modular speaker system that will accommodate to fulfill any and all of your sound needs. Each compact rectangular speaker emits high quality sound in true stereo and can be synced to one another to amplify the maximum volume output.

Ensure you always have a writing utensil at hand by placing the world’s smallest indestructible edc pen on your keychain. At just five centimeters long, this pint-sized pen is crafted from tungsten carbide for unmatched durability.

Go Chair is the ultra portable chair that conveniently folds down to the size of a water bottle! Despite its small size, it features a super sturdy frame that can support up to 300 pounds and can be easily set up using only one hand for further convenience.

Instantly transform the look and feel of any room in your home using the Canvia interactive art display. This high-tech accessory employs smart tech to adapt curated art to your room’s ambient visual conditions and decor while making digital images look like authentic paintings.

Who says a portable a/c unit can’t be both stylish and functional? This portable air conditioner from Coolingstyle is lightweight, easy to charge, features 3 cooling levels with a 55 square foot capacity, and can even repel mosquitoes!

Slice and dice like a professional chef by upgrading to these Japanese steel kitchen knives. Each knife in this six piece set comes with a sleek ergonomic handle complemented by a razor-sharp Japanese steel blade displaying a beautiful Damascus floral pattern.

Transform your run-of-the-mill cooler into a portable tap with the Beergater beer tap cooler attachment. This all-in-one system allows you to pour your cold brew into your cup directly from the tap without the hassle of renting a keg or other costly equipment.

The Looking Glass is the first desktop holographic display designed for 3D creators – no VR or AR headgear required. This revolutionary tool employs a unique holographic display that uses a combination of lightfield and volumetric technologies.
Become the proud owner of a truly tailored custom Harker Watch. It makes a great gift for any classy chap in your life, with dozens of customization options and quality materials to choose from!

Get one step closer to achieving the ocean burial of your dreams by hitting the water inside this pink coffin pool float. This striking piece sports an eye-catching pink hue and comes with a spacious interior and an accompanying lid so that you can close the casket.

With the compact folding hammock handy you’ll always have a comfy place to kick back and take in your surroundings. The functional design eliminates the need for trees or posts – allowing you to set up the hammock virtually anywhere!

Tribe Wallet 4.0 is a sleek & sophisticated minimalist wallet. With 360 RFID protection, it is ideal for travel, events, and everyday adventures. To use it simply push your cards up and pinch the bottom. Available in 6 styles.

Usher your home into the future by upgrading to the KeyWe Smart Lock. Equipped with an Ansi Grade 2 deadbolt, this high-tech lock features a solid aluminum construction and allows you to open your door in 1 of 6 ways like with a guest key or a passcode.

Make your weekly game nights the talk of your social circle by gathering everyone to play Trogdor!! The Board Game. Players take on the role of hooded cult members who must devote their lives to aiding the mighty Trogdor dragon in his quest to burninate the countryside!

Marshmallow cottony soft bath towels that soak water as a super sponge waffle. They are surprisingly lightweight, but fluffy. Innovative XL waffle weave design. They dry super fast between uses, even when folded! Stinky towels gone forever!

Relieve debilitating back pain in as little as 5 minutes a day by using the Plexus back pain relief wheel. Available in 3 sizes, this useful tool will help alleviate discomfort by releasing pinched nerves, reduce bulging discs, and restore the natural curvature of the spine.

With the premise that no two trips are the same, Travel Line has designed a versatile travel backpack that will cater to any type of traveler. It comes with a series of pouches and packing cubes so you can conveniently organize your gear inside the ample interior.

Cook a scrumptious hot meal anytime, anywhere, with the highest efficiency hybrid solar oven on the planet. The GoSun Fusion Hybrid uses solar power to cook while off-the-grid, and integrates with a solar powered battery so that you can even use it at night!

Give your music listening experience a futuristic sci-fi touch by blasting your tunes out of this HAL 9000 Bluetooth speaker. HAL’s dimensions were taken right from the original studio blueprints to ensure maximum authenticity.

With the Beeline Moto smart navigation system mounted on your motorcycle you’ll be able to effortlessly navigate through town without having to constantly stop to check your phone. It’s waterproof, shockproof, and features an extraordinary battery life.

Whether the situation calls for measuring, screwing, or drawing a straight line, this credit card sized multi-tool is just what you need. This stainless steel tool sports a plethora of useful tools perfect for everything from cutting open a box to popping open your cold brew.

Making music on-the-go has never been easier or more fun thanks to Oddball – the drum machine ball! Each time you bounce the ball, the built-in sensors communicate with the app via Bluetooth to play a sound through your headphones, speakers, or smartphone.

titleEN: The Next Generation Of Water Guns
content: All other water guns just became obsolete thanks to Spyra One – the next generation water gun. It refills in just 14 seconds, requires absolutely no pumping, and is able to fire a powerful 30mL “water bullet” capable of hitting targets up to 25 feet away.

If you’re an old school gamer, this SEGA arcade pop-up book is a must-have! Apart from going into detail over classic games like OutRun and Space Harrier, it comes with special heavy duty paper pages so that you can build five large scale pop-up models.

Ensure you always have a cozy room and comfy bed to sleep in when you’re on the road by hooking the Hitch Hotel expandable camper to your trusty ride. It features an expandable design that can extend to over 7 feet long – large enough for 3 people to sleep comfortably.

titleEN: The Maker Knife EDC Pocket Tool
content: Ensure you always have a razor sharp blade handy when you need it most carrying around the Maker Knife EDC pocket tool. It’s compact, lightweight, and features a simple sliding blade mechanism that you can easily operate with one hand.

Remain connected to the digital world – even if your smartphone is beyond your reach – with the Xenxo smart ring. This accessory will allow you to do everything from placing calls to making payments, and even using hand gestures to control other smart devices.

Bristly is the toothbrush for dogs that makes it remarkably convenient to keep your canine’s chompers clean and healthy. Made from highly durable natural rubber, it features a delightful meat flavor that will encourage your dog to want to brush regularly.

The ProPoint travel mouse presenter is the pint-sized ergonomic mouse you can comfortably use virtually anywhere! It’s small enough to use on your laptop’s palm-rest and can be utilized as an in-air presenter that you can use to draw on the screen with hand gestures.

Keep nosy bystanders from overhearing your personal calls by putting on this voice privacy mouthpiece mask. This handy device is placed over the mouth while the microphone slips into the side compartment – substantially blocking your voice while you talk.

Take the guesswork out of your nutrition in a single breath. Lumen is a device and app that measures your metabolism through the breath. With the app, you will receive daily personalized meal plans to help you lose weight and optimize your workouts.

Avoid melting in the insufferable summer heat when you venture outdoors by bringing along this handheld personal cooling device. The lid comes with a built-in turbine fan system with an elongated air post that will create a steady cool breeze.

Give your trusty airsoft firearm a serious upgrade using this high tech airsoft gun computer attachment. Encased in a sturdy laser printer polymer enclosure, this futuristic device comes with features like a battery monitor, ammo counter, and a real time clock.

The Smart Belt 2.0 is the last belt you will ever have to buy. Apart from the quality Italian leather, it features a nearly indestructible kevlar core, and replaces the standard 5-hole system with a more convenient micro-adjustment system to ensure a perfect fit every time.

Look your best all day long by giving your formal wear a more fitted look using this tucker shirt-stay. It hooks onto your shirt’s bottom button and wraps around your body like a belt so that your shirt remains firmly tucked in for a more slimming look.

Meet RuckBucket – the world’s toughest insulated backpack. This ultra-rugged crushproof, watertight, and insulated bucket backpack can carry anything from your gear to fresh bait and is sturdy enough to double as a comfy seat.

Take the playground by storm with the Wham-O square frisbee. Instead of the traditional circular shape, it features a bold square design that helps the frisbee fly straight while also creating aerodynamic pockets that make catching it way easier than a regular frisbee.

JOEE is the cooler organizer system that makes it remarkably easy to access everything that you’ve packed. It features a removable divider that creates three different storage areas so that you can easily keep your beverages and food separated.

Show your support for one of the most recognized justices on the bench with this Ruth Bader Ginsburg action figure. Displaying an unrelenting stern look on her face, this pint-sized RBG is dressed in her signature black robe and holds a miniature wooden gavel.

Tusk is the multi-purpose survival shovel that’s a must-have for winter. Tested in the harshest conditions in Iceland, this heavy-duty shovel comes fitted with 7 ultra useful tools – a squeegee, a shovel, a root cutter, a spade, an ice scraper, a reflector, and a snow plow.
